briefdescription.para: threadfence_block makes writes visible to threads running in same block.

simplesect.para: __threadfence_block is a stub and map to no-op.

briefdescription.para: threadfence makes wirtes visible to other threads running on same GPU.

simplesect.para: __threadfence is a stub and map to no-op, application should set "export HSA_DISABLE_CACHE=1" to disable both L1 and L2 caches.

briefdescription.para: threadfence_system makes writes to pinned system memory visible on host CPU.

simplesect.para: __threadfence_system is a stub and map to no-op.

briefdescription.para: Contains definitions of APIs for HIP runtime.
